participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative, sociable, and nurturing. Enjoys engaging in various activities and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I still dream about going to Paris and designing clothes. I spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events. I own a black suburban. I am a member of four book clubs, the PTA, and two brunch groups. I drink a lot of apple martinis when I get a girls night out.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Outspoken and passionate about his interests, especially music and gaming. Enjoys a laid-back lifestyle.
participant_2.background: My favorite type of music is metal. I like watching TV and movies. I have a lot of allergies. I work in commercials.

content.text: Hey, I'm participant_1, what's your name?
I'm participant_2! Nice to meet you.
You too! What do you do for fun?
I like watching tv and movies, and I also work in commercials.
Oh, cool! What kind of commercials do you work on?
I do a lot of different types, but I mostly work on car commercials.
That sounds fun! I like watching car commercials.
Me too! They're always so exciting.
What's your favorite type of music?
I like metal.
Oh, that's cool! I've never really been into metal, but I can appreciate it.
There's a lot of different kinds of metal, so you might like it if you gave it a chance.
Maybe I will! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
Well, if you ever want to check out some metal, I can give you some recommendations.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
No problem!
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like going to the movies, and I also like playing video games.
Oh, cool! I love going to the movies too. I haven't played video games in a while, but I used to love them.
I'm always playing video games. I have a lot of different systems, so I can play all kinds of games.
That sounds awesome! I used to only have a Nintendo 64, but I've upgraded since then.
Nice! What system do you have now?
I have a PlayStation 4 and a Nintendo Switch.
Oh, nice! I have a PlayStation 4 too.
Cool! We should play some time.
Definitely! I'd love to.
